page.title: 14Hampton Railway Station
page.content: I live right next to the{railway} {station.}Sometimes when I am waiting for a{train}I see the express train before the train I want to go on, so when the express train has come past us I know that the train I am going to go on will be coming soon. Sometimes at night I hear the{express}and if I am quick enough, I look out of the window and I see the sparks of fire coming from the railway line and I hear the crackling noise that it makes. The station has two long ramp platforms. On one side there is a long ramp to exit on and on the other side there are steps. The station has one waiting room on the Birmingham side because more people want to go to {Birmingham}than to{Coventry.}From Monday to Saturday there are 66 trains.
